name: Pipelines
description: A service that provides support for dumping and injecting shader pipelines

functions.name: QueryHashes
functions.description: Queries the hash values of all available pipelines

functions.name: QueryPipelines
functions.description: Queries the list of pipelines that match the provided hash list

functions.name: QueryAllPipelines
functions.description: Queries the complete list of pipelines

functions.name: InjectPipelines
functions.description: Injects the provided list of pipelines
